summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of all 16 new CRUD pages for Revenue (Evaluations, Commits, Contracts) and Procurement (Orders) sub-modules. All pages are working correctly with proper data-testid attributes, form submissions, navigation, and API integration.

ui_bugs.issue: Contract name not displayed in header - only shows contract_id (CNT-001)

revenue_evaluations.list: WORKING - Shows 3 evaluations with search, filter, stats cards
revenue_evaluations.create: WORKING - Form submits and redirects to list
revenue_evaluations.detail: WORKING - Shows evaluation info with Edit/Delete buttons
revenue_evaluations.edit: WORKING - Form loads existing data and saves changes

revenue_commits.list: WORKING - Shows 3 commits with total value ₹18.5L
revenue_commits.create: WORKING - Form submits with name, value, quarter, owner
revenue_commits.detail: WORKING - Shows commit info with Edit/Delete buttons

revenue_contracts.list: WORKING - Shows 2 contracts with total value ₹15.0L
revenue_contracts.create: WORKING - Form submits with customer, dates, value
revenue_contracts.detail: WORKING - Shows contract info with Edit/Delete buttons

procurement_orders.list: WORKING - Shows 2 POs with total value ₹15.0L
procurement_orders.create: WORKING - Form submits with PO number, vendor, dates, value
procurement_orders.detail: WORKING - Shows order info with Edit/Delete buttons
procurement_orders.edit: WORKING - Form loads existing data with po_id param

crud_cycles_verified.update: Edit form loads with existing data
Edit form loads with existing data
Edit form loads with existing data
Edit form loads with existing data (uses po_id param)

navigation_tested.back_buttons: WORKING - All create/detail/edit pages have working back buttons
navigation_tested.list_to_create: WORKING - New buttons navigate to create forms
navigation_tested.list_to_detail: WORKING - Clicking rows navigates to detail pages
navigation_tested.detail_to_edit: WORKING - Edit buttons navigate to edit forms
navigation_tested.after_create_redirect: WORKING - Redirects to list after successful create

critical_code_review_comments: All 16 new CRUD pages follow consistent patterns with proper API URL from env, correct token handling, and data-testid attributes
All forms have proper validation and error handling
Navigation is consistent across all modules
Orders module correctly uses po_id as the ID parameter (not order_id)
seed_data_creation: Created test items during CRUD testing: TEST-EVAL-001 (Evaluation), TEST-COMMIT-001 (Commit), TEST-CONTRACT-001 (Contract), PO-TEST-001 (Purchase Order)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 16 new CRUD pages for Revenue (Evaluations, Commits, Contracts) and Procurement (Orders) sub-modules are fully functional. Each module has List, Create, Detail, Edit pages with proper data-testid attributes. Backend APIs are working correctly. Combined with iteration_9 testing, the Commerce platform now has 60+ working CRUD pages across all modules.
